name: call_add_event_agent
description: Call the AddEventAgent to add a new event into user's schedule.

user_input.description: The user input for the plan schedule.

name: call_remove_event_agent
description: Call the RemoveEventAgent to remove an event from user's schedule.

user_input.description: The user input for the remove schedule.

name: call_modify_event_agent
description: Call the ModifyEventAgent to modify an event from user's schedule.

user_input.description: The user input for the modify schedule.

name: call_chat_agent
description: Call the ChatAgent to chat with a user.

user_input.description: The user input for the chat.
The user input for the recall.
